about_the_game:
Get ready for an intense and dynamic 2D shooter inspired by classics like Space Invaders and Galaga! In Space Defense Special Force, control your ship through a screen full of enemies while customizing your ship with various weapon, attribute, and design options. Move freely in all directions – forward, backward, left, and right – and challenge your reflexes in different game modes.

Play Arcade, choose from power cards to enhance your abilities or recover your health in the first 10 levels out of the 250 in the paid version.
